metadata.description: How balanced the authority and influence feels between you

astrological_basis.what_it_measures: Pluto shows power dynamics and control. Sun shows ego and authority. Saturn shows hierarchy and boundaries.

planet_meanings.Pluto: power, control, and who holds influence
planet_meanings.Sun: ego, authority, and need for recognition
planet_meanings.Saturn: hierarchy, boundaries, and respect for position

very_low.label: Lopsided
very_low.guidance: One tends to dominate; stress boundaries and clarity.

low.label: Tilted
low.guidance: Power leans one way; notice when shrinking or over-functioning.

mid.label: Shifting
mid.guidance: Balance changes by context; invite awareness.

high.label: Balanced
high.guidance: Power generally mutual; good for collaboration.

very_high.label: Empowering
very_high.guidance: Uplift each other's authority; great for co-leading.
